entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near Haro Strait late this evening and overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 early in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 1.
